attributes.action: Hold a General Election on the 15th of October
attributes.additional_details: Please note that this petition requests that a general election is to be held on 15th October and so it does NOT request the same action as set out in petition number 264215
attributes.background: Since the EU referendum in June 2016, Parliament has not implemented the decision of the people. A general election, to take place on the 15th of October 2019, would be to the most effective way to ensure that the Brexit chaos is resolved.

rejection.details:
As Parliament is prorogued until 14 October it is not possible for an election to be held on 15 October.  

You might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/264215
